MemoryInfobox.description: 'Alkibiades, his charm known to get him in ample amounts of trouble, was poisoned at a party celebrating the Olympic Games|Games. Kassandra went in search of the culprit — and a way to save her friend.'

General_Description: '''The Long Game''' was a virtual representation of one of [[Kassandra]]'s genetic memories, relived by [[Layla Hassan]] through the Portable [[Animus|Animus HR-8.5]].
Section_Description: Following the poisoning of [[Alkibiades]] at a party, Kassandra went in search of the culprit and the antidote to the poison.
Section_Dialogue:
Kassandra hurried to the [[Leonidaion]]. Upon entering, she was greeted by several corpses of men and women alike. *'''Kassandra:''' ''This was definitely poison, and Alkibiades wasn't the only victim.'' As she took a turn, out to a hallway, she saw more bodies. *'''Kassandra:''' ''The [[Olympic Truce|truce]] is fragile enough...'' She then went to the kitchen on the opposite side, near the entrance. She walked to the center towards the preparation table and examined the mixture of food. *'''Kassandra:''' ''This food smells strange, but it's not rotten.'' Kassandra looked around and saw wine jugs sitting atop a storage chest and immediately deduced their contents. *'''Kassandra:''' ''This proves it, poison! It must have been added to the food and wine.'' She then entered the empty larder room and read the banquet supply list left in the corner. *'''Kassandra:''' ''Hmm, a supply list for the celebration... and the merchant's name.
Time to pay this [[Priam]] a visit.'' In a stoa near the entrance and the [[Stables of Olympia|stables]], Kassandra met the merchant in his [[Priam's shop|shop]], but she was ambushed by a [[Cult of Kosmos|Cult]] guard before she could confront him. She killed the ambusher and returned her attention to Priam, cracking her knuckles. *'''Kassandra:''' ''Now we're going to have a conversation.'' He cowered in fear. *'''Priam:''' ''Please, please, I was just doing what I was told.'' |-|I'm your boss now.= *'''Kassandra:''' ''Now you'll do what ''I'' tell you.'' Kassandra grabbed him by the throat. *'''Priam:''' ''Please, I thought we were just trying to make them slow—you know, so they lose. Win a few [[drachma]]e...'' *'''Kassandra:''' ''My friend [[Alkibiades]] may already be dead, and you're talking about drachmae.'' *'''Priam:''' ''The golden boy? I was there. He didn't have much—if you can get him the antidote, he'll survive.'' *'''Kassandra:''' ''Tell me where it is.'' She let go and pushed him back. *'''Priam:''' ''They're sure to have it at [[Fort Koroibos]]. A man there paid me to do this. Look there.'' {{#tag:tabber| Attack – First, you must pay.= *'''Kassandra:''' ''Whoever did this will pay, but I'll take care of you first.'' Priam fled in fear. {{!}}-{{!}} Leave – Get out of my sight.= *'''Kassandra:''' ''Whoever did this will pay. Go, and don't let me see your face again.'' *'''Priam:''' ''Yes, thank you...'' }} |-|Attack – For that you will die.= *'''Kassandra:''' ''Your actions could cost Alkibiades his life. Now you will pay with yours.'' Priam fled in fear. |-|Help me and I'll spare you.= *'''Kassandra:''' ''I'm not after you, just whoever wanted this done.'' *'''Priam:''' ''I don't know, I never saw him. I just thought he wanted to fix a race, but then I saw what started happening and I knew they'd been poisoned.'' *'''Kassandra:''' ''My friend Alkibiades—I need to save him.'' *'''Priam:''' ''You'll like find the antidote up at [[Fort Koroibos]].'' {{#tag:tabber| Attack – First, you must pay.= *'''Kassandra:''' ''Whoever did this will pay, but I'll take care of you first.'' Priam fled in fear. {{!}}-{{!}} Leave – Get out of my sight.= *'''Kassandra:''' ''Whoever did this will pay. Go, and don't let me see your face again.'' *'''Priam:''' ''Yes, thank you...'' }} Regardless, Kassandra learned where to get the antidote. She infiltrated Fort Koroibos, wherein she located the antidote. *'''Kassandra:''' ''This must be the antidote.'' Back at the Sanctuary, she found Alkibiades and Barnabas in the [[Olympic Clinic|clinic]] near Leonidaion. Alkibiades rested on one of the beds. *'''Kassandra:''' ''Here, I have the antidote.'' [[File:ACOD_The_Long_Game_-_Alkibiades_drinking_antidote.png|thumb|250px|Alkibiades drinking the antidote]] Barnabas took the antidote and handed it to Alkibiades, who sat up to drink. The antidote took effect immediately. *'''Alkibiades:''' ''Ugh, more wine please, to wash away the taste.'' *'''Barnabas:''' ''A treatment worthy of [[Hippokrates]]!'' Alkibiades looked up to Kassandra and smiled wryly. *'''Alkibiades:''' ''I can already feel my ''stamina'' returning...'' Barnabas rubbed the back of his head and cleared his throat. He addressed Kassandra. *'''Barnabas:''' ''Didn't you have one last fight in the pankration?'' She agreed and turned her gaze to Alkibiades. *'''Kassandra:''' ''Let's go.'' Alkibiades stood up and followed them out.
Section_Outcome: Kassandra retrieved the antidote from Fort Koroibos and administered it to Alkibiades, saving his life.
